translation.Message_0_Page_0: Right, so the radio tower was just the beginning my child.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: However, we will need some more intelligence before conducting more serious operations against these pests.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: I've known about one of their underground facilities for a while, but I've never dared to peek inside.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Perhaps they have something worthwhile in there...
translation.Message_0_Page_4: <name_char>, you must drill into the penguins' bunker and <color=#64c819>Gather Intelligence</color>.
translation.Response_1: I don't think penguins can even write. No thanks.
